instruction: Append a new paragraph to the text below that provides evidence that supports the claim that the climate crisis is real.
input: The climate crisis has become an urgent issue and there are many people who deny its existence.
output: Recent reports from the United Nation’s Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) have made it clear that the global climate is warming due to human activities, like burning of fossil fuels and deforestation. Furthermore, numerous scientific studies have also found that the Arctic and Antarctic are both losing more ice than ever before and sea levels are rapidly rising as well.
